title: Scandinavian Design Examples
content:
Hi all,  
Does anyone know of any good Scandinavian design examples (magazines, books, etc.)?

Thanks,  
Will
author: winglets747

comments.content:
Lots of (good) recent examples in:  
"North by North"  
/scandinavian graphic design/  
pub Die Gestalten Verlag. 2002  
 worth every penny.

In the interweb:  
 [http://www.swedengraphics.com/v2/start.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307104739/http:/www.swedengraphics.com/v2/start.html "http://www.swedengraphics.com/v2/start.html")

The best of Finnish advertising and design 2005 (in Finnish)

the winners can be found under kultahuiput and hopeahuiput (top left corner)

[https://www.grafia.fi/index.php?grafia=1145177573f4c6487e043d08ed094550b...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307104739/https:/www.grafia.fi/index.php?grafia=1145177573f4c6487e043d08ed094550bd1d6b7195&article_id=4928& __from_id__ =4034 "https://www.grafia.fi/index.php?grafia=1145177573f4c6487e043d08ed094550bd1d6b7195&article\_id=4928&\_\_from\_id\_\_=4034")
